abstract: A bankruptcy court judge in New Jersey approved the sale of the Tropicana Casino and Resort to a group of creditors led by Carl C. Icahn.
snippet: A bankruptcy court judge in New Jersey approved the sale of the Tropicana Casino and Resort to a group of creditors led by Carl C. Icahn.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn is rolling the dice again in Atlantic City.

headline.main: Icahn Group Wins Deal for Tropicana
